Author: Wyrify
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸ’µ Worlds first ICO by a public listed company!
Body: Yes we offer 10% referral commission. However I am not entirely sure how a so-called "bounty campaign" here on this forum works? But to make things easy we offer unique URLs for anybody who believe they can attract investors, so anybody signing up through that URL will automatically assign a 10% bonus to the referer. Just email us for details.   Do you anticipate getting listed on any exchanges? Yes after the ICO is concluded we will be listing the WYR Tokens on exchanges.   A publicly listed company could issue shares and bonds as well to fund it's plans.... Giving up future profit for instant capital is very much how the bond works. What is the reason you go to the ICO way rather than the traditional and trusted way? Blockchain and especially Blockchain payments like we are doing with our stable cryptocurrency is very much about not going the traditional way. We are the better alternative to oldschool banking systems and the only alternative to the millions of unbanked. We try to make things easier for people and the same goes for fund raising...
